usablelenses: PENTAX KAF3, KAF2, KAF, and KA (K mount, 35mm screwmount, 645/67 med format lenses useable w adapter and/or restrictions)
dustremoval: DR II (ultrasonic vibration to low pass filter) with Dust Alert function
powersource: Rechargeable Li-Ion battery D-LI90, D-BG4 Battery Grip (optional) for 2nd D-LI90 battery or 6X AA batteries
focuspointadjustment: Auto 11 Point, Auto 5 Point, User-Selectable, Center
constructionmaterials: Magnesium alloy shell over stainless steel chassis
autofocus: Yes, Contrast + Face Detection, Contrast Detection, Phase Difference
type: Hotshoe (P-TTL), high speed sync and wireless w PENTAX dedicated flash, X-Sync Socket
afassist: Yes, via dedicated LED AF assist lamp
focusmodes: AF Single (w focus lock, focus/shutter priority selectable), AF Continuous (w focus/FPS priority selectable), Manual
flashmodes: On, Redeye, Slow Sync, Slow Sync + Redeye, Trailing Curtain Sync, Wireless
typeconstruction: PENTAX KAF2 bayonet stainless steel mount
ports: USB 2.0 hi-speed, AV out, HDMI out, DC in, cable switch, 3.5mm stereo microphone, X-sync socket
